Posts.Title: Breece D’J Pancake died
Posts.Description: Breece D’J Pancake died when he was 26. He was from West Virginia, and I would label his writing “grit-lit”. This story was almost too gritty for me. He’s the kind of writer that other writers love. His short story collection has a blurb from Joyce Carol Oates.

Posts.Title: THE LOTTERY
Posts.Description: This used to be my favorite short story, and I might only think that because I read it when I was a freshman in high school and I remember being shocked by the ending
